item.title: RenXchange is Hiring!
item.description: Do you want to make a difference for RPI? Do you want to gain skills in fundraising, communication, and customer service? You’re in luck! RenXchange is hiring! Spaces are limited – apply at https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/5620f155c9d94a76977dc3806bb3584c. For more information contact Uzi…

item.title: The National Society of Leadership and Success Presents: Speaker Broadcast Series with Oprah Winfrey! | Oct. 21
item.description: Date: Tuesday, October 21, 2025 12:00 AM - 1:00 AM - Join The NSLS RPI Chapter as we watch a live broadcast with Oprah Winfrey. She’ll speak on her experiences as a leader and offer a candid reflections on how students can grow as leaders themselves! Popcorn will be provided!

item.title: Neil Rolnick Performs: SoloS | Oct. 24
item.description: Composer and electronic music pioneer Neil Rolnick will perform SoloS, a program of works for solo laptop that spans his career from the late 1970s to the present. The performance includes a range of works from early pieces for digital sampler to his multimedia collaboration with experimental filmmaker Barbara Hammer. Join us October 24 at 7pm at the RPI Chapel and Cultural Center.

item.title: Early Morning Network Maintenance Scheduled for October 18
item.description: Due to necessary hardware maintenance, a scheduled network outage will take place from approximately 5:00AM to 7:00AM on Saturday, October 18. During this time, both on- and off-campus network connectivity will be unavailable, including wired and wireless connectivity, IP phones, and any other service which relies on network connectivity.

item.description: CBIS played a significant role in organizing the upcoming 2025 BioInnovation Forum: Frontiers of Biotechnology, and we hope you’ll join us - It’s a great opportunity for post-docs & early career faculty to present their work as part of the poster session! item.title: Pillars of Rensselaer
item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 15, 2025 12:00 AM - Wed , October 22, 2025 7:00 PM - Any members of the Rensselaer community may nominate any individuals for the Pi award. Nominations for the Pillars Award will be accepted until October 20, 2025. All nominations MUST be electronic through a Qualtrics Form found at https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV_6g5ysFQ3HlVnhQO. Questions can be directed to pillarsnomination@rpi.edu

item.title: Department of Economics Fall Seminar Series Presents Dr. Gagan Ghosh on 10/22
item.description: The Department of Economics is excited to welcome Dr. Gagan Ghosh, who will be presenting “Product varieties, private costs and price competition” on Wednesday, October 22 at 3:30 PM in SAGE 5101. We encourage all interested members of the RPI community to attend.

item.title: Cognitive Science Colloquia - Dr. Selmer Bringsjord Speaks
item.description: Join the Cognitive Science Department on Wednesday, October 22nd from 12:00 - 1:30 PM for a presentation by Professor Selmer Bringsjord titled “AI, the Mindsets of Private Equity and Activist Investing, and Baumol’s Cost Disease: The Four Horsemen Coming to Kill K–16 Education as We Know It”.
